original_title: Classic Plane Making: Volume 1 - Hollows & Rounds
overview: Classic Planemaking Volume 1: Hollows and Rounds is a great starter for rediscovering the joys of using hand tools. Hollows and rounds form the basic kit of molding planes, and making your own set is a great and inexpensive way for you to get started in this creative art. Todd Herrli walks you through detailed step-by-step instructions for making a working plane.
title: Classic Plane Making: Volume 1 - Hollows & Rounds
